title: Socket-outlets
fullText:
Socket-outlets shall not be installed in the battery enclosure.
Where the battery enclosure is part of a larger room (e.g. the battery enclosure is a fenced off area in a larger room), all socket-outlets shall be located at least 1800 mm from the battery enclosure and a minimum of 100 mm below the top of the battery or any battery vent, if within 5 m of the battery enclosure.
